sale next year. The company also is working on natural gas vehicles and will lead the field in offering 8- and 9-speed transmissions, designed for use with hybrids, in a wide range of vehicles. By 2013 we will have one of the most fuel-efficient fleets, Sergio Marchionne said Wednesday in announcing a demonstration fleet of up to 20 hydraulic hybrid Chrysler Town& Country minivans. Fuel economy on the minivans should improve 60 percent in city driving and 30 percent to 35 percent overall.

Dev showcased its latest Maestro 3 app dev choreography environment-- a cloud-based solution that stitches together the discreet steps( build, test, deploy, etc.) of application development, using existing tools for each step Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
